 37 -    def __init__(self, seed=None, environment=None, 
 38              engine=SimPy.Simulation.Simulation): 

 39          """ 
 40          Initialise simulation. 
 41   
 42          @param seed: Seed value for L{np.random.RandomState}. 
 43          @param environment: L{Environment} to simulate in. 
 44          @param engine: L{SimPy.Simulation} subclass to drive simulation. 
 45          """ 
 46          self.environment = Environment() if environment is None else environment 
 47          self.engine = engine() 
 48          self.engine.initialize() 
 49          self.rng = np.random.RandomState(seed)

 52 -    def time(self): 

 53          """ The current true time within the simulation (float). """ 
 54          assert hasattr(self, '_startTime'), 'Simulation time has not been set.' 
 55          return self.engine.now() + self._startTime

 58 -    def time(self, time): 

 59          assert not hasattr(self, '_startTime'), 'Simulation time already set.' 
 60          self._startTime = time

 62 -    class ProgressMonitor(SimPy.Simulation.Process): 

 63          """ 
 64          Simple process to print status and remaining simulation time at 5% 
 65          progress intervals. 
 66          """ 

 67 -        def __init__(self, sim, duration): 

 68              SimPy.Simulation.Process.__init__(self, sim=sim) 
 69              self.startTime = sim.now() 
 70              self.duration = duration 
 71              sim.activate(self, self.printProgress()) 

 72   

 73 -        def printProgress(self): 

 74              for i in range(0,20): 
 75                  start = time.time() 
 76                  yield SimPy.Simulation.hold, self, self.duration / 20.0 
 77                  now = self.sim.now() - self.startTime 
 78                  end = time.time() 
 79   
 80                  remaining = (20-i) * (end-start) 
 81                  print ("Simulated %.1fs of %.1fs (%3.0f%%). " + 
 82                          "Estimated time remaining %.1fs") \ 
 83                          %(now, self.duration, (i + 1) * 5, remaining) 

 84   

 85 -    def run(self, endTime, printProgress=True): 

 86          """ 
 87          Advance the simulation up to the given time. 
 88   
 89          @param endTime: Simulation time at which to stop (float). 
 90          @param printProgress: Whether to print progress information (bool). 
 91          """ 
 92   
 93          if printProgress: 
 94              print "Simulating..." 
 95              startTime = self.time 
 96              duration = endTime - startTime 
 97              progressMonitor = self.ProgressMonitor(self.engine, duration) 
 98   
 99          startWallTime = time.time() 
100          self.engine.simulate(endTime - self._startTime) 
101          endWallTime = time.time() 
102   
103          if printProgress: 
104              print "Simulation complete." 
105              print "Simulated %.1f seconds in %.1f seconds." % ( 
106                      endTime - startTime, endWallTime - startWallTime) 

107   

108 -    def subrng(self): 

109          """ 
110          Obtain a new random number generator seeded from the main RNG. 
111   
112          @return: A L{np.random.RandomState} instance. 
113          """ 
114          return np.random.RandomState(seed=int(self.rng.uniform(0,2**31)))
